description:
As a busy entrepreneur or professional, you may have experienced the frustration of employees who are not performing like you have hoped. In most cases, the employee has the potential of performing just the way you want, all that is needed is coaching. This course will teach you how to get the best of out your people and build a dynamic team.

• Understand the difference between coaching and training

• Learn what success coaching is all about

• Learn to coach high performers

• Learn to coach developing employees

• Understand the benefits of peer coaching

• Learn to assess progress
title: Performance Management: Coaching & Energizing Your Employees
